short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automaticly creates a bot command for e.g. Discord from a Youtube page. You can assign the prefix by clicking the extension icon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension creates a bot command and copies it to your clipboard with just a click on a Youtube page. These commands use a prefix like !play or -play, but the prefix can be user defined by acccessing the extension popup. 
Bot !Play makes playing music from a chatbot in e.g. Discord a lot easier as you don't have to add the prefix manually. 

This is not a bot! This is only a Chrome extension, which adds a button to the Youtube layout, allowing you to copy the link to your clipboard.
